product_name: Sunlite Defender Key/Chain Bike Lock - 2013 Overstock
long_description: With the durable strength of heat-treated steel links, the Sunlite Defender Key/Chain Bike Lock keeps your bike locked down with heavy-duty security. Heavy-duty padlock with 2 keys offers reliable security for locking your bike in urban environments. Weatherproof nylon cover protects your paint job from scratches and nicks. Overstock.
short_description: With the durable strength of heat-treated steel links, the Sunlite Defender Key/Chain Bike Lock keeps your bike locked down with heavy-duty security.
